realestate.name: MyHome Group Real Estate Agent
realestate.description: Voice agent for MyHome Group real estate inquiries, property details, and pricing information
realestate.startup_message: <speak xml:lang='en-IN'><prosody rate='medium' pitch='0%'>Welcome to MyHome Constructions. How may I help you with your real estate inquiries today?</prosody></speak>

error_messages.error: <speak xml:lang='en-IN'><prosody rate='medium' pitch='0%'>I apologize, I couldn't understand your real estate query. Please try again.</prosody></speak>
error_messages.unclear_audio: <speak xml:lang='en-IN'><prosody rate='medium' pitch='0%'>I couldn't hear your request clearly. Could you please repeat?</prosody></speak>
error_messages.unsupported_language: <speak xml:lang='en-IN'><prosody rate='medium' pitch='0%'>I'm sorry, but that language isn't supported for real estate inquiries. Please use English, Telugu or Hindi.</prosody></speak>

hospital.name: Yashoda Hospital Agent
hospital.description: Voice agent for Yashoda Hospital appointment scheduling and inquiries
hospital.startup_message: <speak xml:lang='en-IN'><prosody rate='medium' pitch='0%'>Welcome to <speak><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='jəˈʃoːda'>Yashoda</phoneme></speak> Hospital. How may I assist you with your appointment or medical inquiry today?</prosody></speak>

error_messages.error: <speak xml:lang='en-IN'><prosody rate='medium' pitch='0%'>I apologize, I couldn't understand. Please try again.</prosody></speak>
error_messages.unclear_audio: <speak xml:lang='en-IN'><prosody rate='medium' pitch='0%'>I couldn't hear you clearly. Could you please repeat?</prosody></speak>
error_messages.unsupported_language: <speak xml:lang='en-IN'><prosody rate='medium' pitch='0%'>I'm sorry, but that language isn't supported for hospital inquiries. Please use English or Hindi.</prosody></speak>

default_messages.error: <speak xml:lang='en-IN'><prosody rate='medium' pitch='0%'>I apologize, I couldn't understand. Please try again.</prosody></speak>
default_messages.unclear_audio: <speak xml:lang='en-IN'><prosody rate='medium' pitch='0%'>I couldn't hear you clearly. Could you please repeat?</prosody></speak>
